product_name: Coleman Naturals Insect Repellent Snap Band
long_description: The DEET-free Coleman Naturals Insect Repellent Snap Band uses natural oils to repel bugs while a flexible snap-bracelet design lets you take it anywhere. No smells, chemicals or bugs in sight. Snap Band features citronella oil as the primary ingredient; other active ingredients include geraniol, geranium oil, cinnamon oil, peppermint oil and lemongrass oil. Band features a reservoir to hold the active ingredients, eliminating skin contact that might result in allergic reactions. Coleman Naturals Insect Repellent Snap Band can be attached to wrists, ankles or tent and stake poles.
short_description: The DEET-free Coleman Naturals Insect Repellent Snap Band uses natural oils to repel bugs while a flexible snap-bracelet design lets you take it anywhere. No smells, chemicals or bugs in sight.
